purpose: The email announces the 1st International Summer School on LLM-based Agents for Software Engineering (LLMA4SE 2025), which will take place from September 1-3, 2025, at the University of Extremadura in CÃ¡ceres, Spain. It targets researchers, PhD students, and professionals interested in integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) and Agentic AI into software engineering. The program will feature lectures and hands-on workshops led by internationally recognized experts, covering topics such as LLM-based agents for software development tasks, evaluation of agent-based systems, and human-agent collaboration. Registration is free and includes course materials, meals, and a social dinner, with accommodation scholarships available for students. More information and registration details can be found on the provided website.
